mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_MESSAGE SET is_read = 1 WHERE usr_id = #{usrId} /* 업데이트할 메시지의 발신자 */ AND chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} AND msg_cr_date_ms <= #{readDate} /* 읽은 시간 이하 */
mapper.select: SELECT CM.chat_room_id AS chatRoomId , CM.message AS message , CM.msg_cr_date AS msgCrDate , CM.msg_cr_date_ms AS msgCrDateMs , CM.is_read AS `read` , CM.chat_type AS chatType , USR.nick_name AS nickName FROM MEMBERS USR INNER JOIN CHAT_MESSAGE CM ON CM.usr_id = USR.usr_id WHERE CM.chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} ORDER BY CM.msg_cr_date_ms DESC LIMIT #{rowSize} OFFSET #{offset}
